result.execSummary:
All charges against Will Ernest Smith in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Will Ernest Smith is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Due to not following the payment plan agreement, specifically payment(s) were missed, the payment plan has been ended and the failure to pay action has been enforced.
Assessment for Attorney Fees in the amount of $315.00 entered as ordered by the court on 10/12/15 to pay $50.00 monthly.  Final payment due by 01/04/16. Failure to pay is a Civil Judgment.
signed and filed, Affidavit and Order for Payment of Attorney Fees and Costs

Defendant Will Ernest Smith in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Pursuan to plea negotiations and on State's motion, Court orders case DISMISSED.  Jury panel released.

Defendant Will Ernest Smith in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Parties ready to proceed with Jury Trial.  Jury panel in court at 11:32 and sworn.  Court instructs jury and releases panel for the lunch hour.  Case adjourned to 1:30 pm.

Defendant Will Ernest Smith in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Catelin Ringersma appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case heard off the record. Final Pretrial held. Parties ready to proceed to trial, neither party requests to address the court on the record. Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form. Case adjourned to branch 45 for Jury Trial at 8:30 am on 07-29-2015.

Defendant Will Ernest Smith in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
State has turned over an offer and discovery.  Defense requests a final pretrial and jury trial date.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 46.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for July 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Will Ernest Smith in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Court conducted Indigency Hearing. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by court. Court held colloquy with defendant. Defendant requested court appointed counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense. The court appointed Atty. Michael Plaisted, present in court via telephone, to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $70.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant repay the County at a rate of $50.00 per month beginning 07-01-2015 and the 1st of every month thereafter until paid in full. Court advised defendant failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Signed, Distributed & Filed, Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense. Case is adjourned for a Status of Counsel date in branch 46.  Case scheduled for Status of Counsel on May 15, 2015 at 8:30 am.

Defendant Will Ernest Smith in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant is not eligible for representation by the public defender's office.  Defendant requests time to retain counsel.  Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 46. jks
  Status conference scheduled for 04-30-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Will Ernest Smith in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is eligible for representation by the public defender's office.  Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 46. jks
  Status conference scheduled for 04-30-2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 03-18-2015 at 01:30 pm.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

As an additional condition of bail:
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Drapondra F.    AND/OR  their residence    AND/OR   their place of employment

No dangerous weapons

Court ordered defendant to report for booking and release no later than 3:00 p.m. on 03-06-2015

Defendant Will Ernest Smith in court.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
OCCR Tape#15-044

Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 46.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. 
Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office.  The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 46.
